WorkItem.Description:
The below items selected by the the indicated filters need to be updated.  This list only considers location and ilvl of items (it does not consider if the items have the correct stats):
 
"Blackrock Caverns":
  67127 "Bracers of Caustic Purification" is listed as a drop from Blackrock Caverns but is really a world drop.
  55790 "Toxidunk Dagger" is showing as ilvl 279 where it should be ilvl 308.
 
"Throne of the Tides":
  56294 "Alpheus Legguards" is listed as a heroic trash drop but does not exist in game.
  55260 "Alpheus Legguards" is listed as an ilvl 279 world drop but should be an ilvl 308 trash drop in Throne of the Tides
  56292 "Barnacle Pendant" is listed as a heroic trash drop but does not exist in game
  55262 "Barnacle Pendant" is listed as an ilvl 279 world drop but should be an ilvl 308 trash drop in Throne of the Tides.
  56293 "Ring of the Great Whale" is in the database as "Not found on wowhead" but does not exist in game
  55261 "Ring of the Great Whale is listed as an ilvl 279 world drop but should be an ilvl 308 trash drop in Throne of the Tides
 
"The Stonecore":
  Looks good
 
"Vortex Pinnacle"
  55853 "Thundercall" shows as "Not found on wowhead" but is a trash drop in Vortex Pinnacle
  55855 "Darksky Treads" shows as "Trash drop in Vortex Pinnacle" but is not being captured by the filter.
 
"Lost City of the Tol'vir"
  55881 "Impetuous Query" shows as a world drop but should be a trash drop in Lost city of the Tol'vir
 
"Halls of Origination"
  Looks good
  
"Grim Batol"
  56219 "Shroud of Dark Memories" is listed as a world drop but should be a trash drop in Grim Batol
  56467 "Shroud of Dark Memories" is listed as "Not found on wowhead" but does not exist in game
 
"The Deadmines"
  Looks good

Comments.Message: Are these same issues occurring after Reset Item Cache?
